long_description: The distressed, heavy canvas Sanuk Stevie Boots have custom textile tongues, frayed heel details and cozy fleece linings for top-notch comfort and style on your around-town explorations. Roll the cuffs down or keep them up for 2 different looks. Soles are sealed around the edges to prevent water from getting in. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: The distressed, heavy canvas Sanuk Stevie Boots have custom textile tongues, frayed heel details and cozy fleece linings for top-notch comfort and style on your around-town explorations.
